data.求人内容:
[Laboratory]
Laboratory for Marmoset Neural Architecture (Laboratory Head: Hideyuki Okano)

[Research Field]
The Marmoset Brain Architecture Project, a collaborative effort between professors Partha P Mitra (CSHL) and Hideyuki Okano (Riken BSI) aims to obtain a mesoscale connectivity map of the whole marmoset brain, using methods that have been previously successfully applied in the mouse http://mouse.brainarchitecture.org. This ambitious project will be the first time such a comprehensive mapping attempt has been made for a primate brain, using tracer injections placed on a systematic grid, followed by histological processing, and digital imaging of the entire brain at light microscope resolution. The data set will be subjected to computational neuroanatomical analysis.

[Job title and Job description]
1 Research Scientist (Systems-Network Administrator)

We are looking for an experienced data, storage, and network engineer to design and manage the infrastructure to support large data sets for the ongoing neuroscientific research projects. The ideal candidate will also be able to support an infrastructure for high performance computing and web-based delivery of large files and scientific data.

Responsibilities:
Manage and maintain large distributed solutions for data access, storage, and backup.
Configure fibre and 10G network between individual computing devices and optimize system performance; over 4 TB of new image data will be generated daily.
Work with the research team to understand and meet requirements of the project for data access both on local and external networks.
Provide general support for hardware and/or software as needed in growing computing environment. Includes organizing large data sets, software tools, and web resources.
Deploy and optimize developed solutions and software and/or optimize performance.

[Work location]
RIKEN Brain Science Institute (2-1 Hirosawa, Wako, Saitama, Japan) is located in greater Tokyo area, about 30 min from the center of the city by train.

[Start of Employment]
Negotiable
